title: Singularity & Religion | The Jolly Heretic
description:
Sources:
Prof. Edward Dutton: The Jolly Heretic - /watch?v=OevDvmmbjzI

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/en9RuYuvqy

This is the charity of the most Jesus guy I've seen on YouTube, so if you're into donating to or investigating charities:
https://www.sharetanzania.co.uk/

Once upon a time, I told them I'd buy a shirt but they didn't have it with baseball sleeves. Therefore, I think I spoke this into existence. I now call it a vital part of the Truniform.
Truth Matters:  https://bit.ly/2CHsQBg

nobody is spending any money and

based around
consumption and based around spending
will come apart
and that is the key i think to that
parable um so
we don't have to fear the singularity
for that reason
a second reason why we don't have to
fear the singularity is that the idea
one of the ideas that's floated in the
book is the idea that
the elites are going to come up with

the
life is of eternal importance and

but we don't live in a society like that

we had a society like that in about 1850

people probably wouldn't bother to do so
because even the elites
in society are individualistic and i
just focused on their own hedonistic

you have a you
you have an argument that they will try
